welcome.data: Warm-up discussion: “What is Computer Science and Software Development.

aim.data: State objectives and agenda: Course intro, careers, tools, GitHub workflow.

review.data: Poll student experience with coding. Connect to prior knowledge.

relevant.data: Teach: What is Computer Science and Software Development, Career Paths, Course Overview. Use real examples and job postings.

interactive.data: Activity: “Design Detective” – evaluate 3 websites using a worksheet or Google Form.

ownership.data: Tool setup: WebStorm, GitHub, GitHub Pages, HTML starter file push.

resonate.data: Exit ticket: 1 thing learned, 1 question, GitHub link if finished.

supplies.data: Computers, WebStorm, GitHub access, projector, worksheet/Google Form, Canvas.
